Pre-Game Insights: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said the team is waiting to see how Kerry Carpenter's injury responds before making any lineup or roster decisions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kerry Carpenter is a vital part of Detroit's lineup, and his stunning three-run homer off Cleveland All-Star closer Emmanuel Clase gave the Tigers a 3-0 win in Game 2.
Others: Kerry Carpenter is questionable for Game 5 vs. Guardians due to a hamstring injury
Bligh Madris would be the likely replacement for Carpenter if he is unable to play
The start time for Game 5 has been changed to 1:08 p.m ET due to potential inclement weather
